title: 75019 PARIS THE CAMPAIGN IN PARIS
body:

75019 PARIS THE CAMPAIGN IN PARIS 

iF YOU NEED a nice quite and very sunny large studio for helping you since september 2025 . you can have a very one at 
the high district of BUTTES CHAUMONT 
all white paintings studio a wooden floor a nice kitchen with very good refrigerator congelator . all the district is very sunny and all flowers everywhere with particulars hostels. 

"Description
La butte Bergeyre is a mini district of the 19th arrondissement of Paris, peaking at 100 metres. This hill with its little paved streets and pretty houses is situated a stone’s throw from the park of Buttes-Chaumont. The walker goes up rue Georges Lardennois, rue Philippe-Hecht and rue Barrelet-de-Ricou and discovers a little-known district of Paris with a villagey atmosphere. The highest point of this walk offers a breathtaking view of another hill, the 'butte' Montmartre"



This flat can be rented for 3 or  6 SEASONAL MONTHS ; 
ALL INCLUDED 1450 € WITH ALL THE FEES BUILDING .please whattsapp + 33 620994112. For more information. Excellent pied à terre résidence secondaire.
